sys_ui_message.message:
Step 1: Navigate to your Workday profile, by clicking on your photo or the cloud icon that appears at the top right corner of the Workday screen. Thereafter, click on View Profile.
Step 2: On the left navigation pane (in pink) select the Action button that appears below the employee details. After clicking Action, select Talent and thereafter, select View feedback by request, as shown below.
Step 3: On the Feedback Requested screen, you can filter by Status, Request date or From to view specific details of the feedback you have requested.
